Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, fullung@gmail.com, dsymonds@golang.org, r@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, fullung@gmail.com, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On Dec 9, 2011, at 10:02 PM, dsymonds@golang.org wrote:

> Can you make all the package link paths end in a slash? These ones end
> up with a 301 redirect which, while functional, adds an unnecessary HTTP
> round trip.

i learn something new and broken about the web every day.

done.

-rob

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5477056/diff/2002/doc/go1.html
File doc/go1.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5477056/diff/2002/doc/go1.html#newcode731
doc/go1.html:731: standard Go 1 release distributions, although they will be available in source code form for
How will we make them available? By checking them out from the trunk? Should this be explained?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, fullung@gmail.com, dsymonds@golang.org, r@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, fullung@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

These ones end up with a 301 redirect which, while functional, adds an unnecessary HTTP round trip.
